text:
Major Biden, Democratic donors sign letter warning of Trump victory if Biden doesn’t change Israel policy

More than 100 Democratic Party and Biden donors recently signed a letter to the president warning him that if he doesn’t change his Israel policy, he may lose re-election to former President Trump. The New York Times reported on Tuesday that this letter includes signatures from several donors who …

Read more on foxnews.com
title: Major Biden, Democratic donors sign letter warning of Trump victory if Biden doesn’t change Israel policy | Flipboard
author: Fox News - By Gabriel Hays
